next_steps.step: Even with high win probability, proactively re-engage key stakeholders to solidify the relationship and prevent any last-minute hesitations stemming from potential low engagement risk.
Gather competitive intelligence on the Iberia competition to reinforce our value proposition and proactively address any concerns the customer might have regarding alternative solutions.
Review the customer's existing contracts to identify opportunities for expansion or upselling that could further strengthen our position and increase customer satisfaction.
